amendatorysection.catchline: City council; meetings; quorum; vote required to transact business.
amendatorysection.para: Regular meetings of the council shall be held at least once each week on such days and at such times as the council may prescribe in its rules, and special meetings whenever called by the mayor or any four members of the council. The council may choose not to meet during any week in which a federal or state holiday occurs. Four members of the council shall constitute a quorum for the transaction of any business, and four affirmative votes shall be required to pass any measure or to transact any business unless it is otherwise provided by any charter of a city of the primary class.
